messages.content: ComfyUI_TJ_NormalLighting is a custom node for comfyUI that allows the user to add virtual lighting effects to images using normal maps.
What is the lighting model used in ComfyUI_TJ_NormalLighting?
ComfyUI_TJ_NormalLighting uses the Lambert Reflection Model for calculating diffuse reflection.
What other reflection model is used in addition to the Lambert Reflection Model?
Besides the Lambert Reflection Model, ComfyUI_TJ_NormalLighting also uses Phong's specular reflection model to calculate specular reflection.
What does the specular_power parameter control?
The specular_power parameter controls the strength of specular reflection, physically representing the smoothness and gloss of a surface.
What is the effect of increasing and decreasing the specular_power value?
Increasing the specular_power value makes specular highlights sharper, while decreasing it spreads the highlights wider, giving a softer glow.
What is the role of ambient_light in the output formula?
Ambient_light does not depend on the direction of the light source. When set to 1, the input diffuse_map will be output as is.
